meta_text: e Defeat of the Enemy's Forces a Work which Makes All Your Wishes Come True, Granting Whatever You Need or Hope For,’ being a Presentation of the Three Rites for a Retreat in the Tradition of Our Gentle Savior, the Protector of the Teachings of the Victors, the Diamond Angel of Power (Vajravega), He of Might, Great King Who is an Emanation of the Highest Holy Being_SKYABS RJE PHA BONG KHA PA BDE CHEN SNYING PO (1878-1941)
title_tib: JAM MGON RGYAL BA'I BSTAN SRUNG LHA MCHOG SPRUL PA'I RGYAL CHEN RDO RJE SHUGS LDAN RTZAL BYI BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM GZHAG DGOS 'DOD YID BZHIN RE SKONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM BAR RGYAL BA'I RGYAL MTSAN
